trans-unit.source: A simple interface for the CMU pronouncing dictionary
trans-unit.target: Una simple interfaz para el diccionario de pronunciación de la CMU

trans-unit.source: Acknowledgements
trans-unit.target: Agradecimientos

trans-unit.source: First release on PyPI.
trans-unit.target: Primer lanzamiento en PyPI.

trans-unit.source: History
trans-unit.target: Historia

trans-unit.source: I made Pronouncing because I wanted to be able to use the CMU Pronouncing Dictionary in my projects (and teach other people how to use it) without having to install the grand behemoth that is NLTK.
trans-unit.target: Hice Pronunciamiento porque quería poder usar el Diccionario de Pronunciamiento de CMU en mis proyectos (y enseñar a otras personas a usarlo)sin tener que instalar el gran gigante que es NLTK.

trans-unit.source: Improved performance when retrieving rhyming words. (Based on pull request proposed by WillPiledriver.)
trans-unit.target: Improved performance when retrieving rhyming words. (Based on pull request proposed by WillPiledriver.)

trans-unit.source: Install with pip like so:
trans-unit.target: Instalar con la pipa así:

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: Instalación

trans-unit.source: License
trans-unit.target: Licencia

trans-unit.source: Many fixes and improvements from hugovk (thanks!)
trans-unit.target: Muchas correcciones y mejoras de hugovk (¡gracias!)

trans-unit.source: Messed up the PyPI upload. Yay!
trans-unit.target: Arruinó la subida del PyPI.¡Sí!

trans-unit.source: Pre-compiled regex for improved performance. (Contributed by John Wiseman.)
trans-unit.target: Regex precompilado para mejorar el rendimiento.(Contribución de John Wiseman.)
Pronouncing is a simple interface for the CMU Pronouncing Dictionary. It’s easy to use and has no external dependencies. For example, here’s how to find rhymes for a given word:

trans-unit.source: Read the documentation here: https://pronouncing.readthedocs.org.
trans-unit.target: Read the documentation here: https://pronouncing.readthedocs.org.

trans-unit.source: Removed dictionary data from this package in favor of a dependency on David L. Day’s very nice cmudict package.
trans-unit.target: Removed dictionary data from this package in favor of a dependency on David L. Day’s very nice cmudict package.

trans-unit.source: The Python code in this module is distributed with a BSD license. A full copy of the CMU Pronouncing Dictionary is included in this distribution. Learn more about the CMU Pronouncing Dictionary here: http://www.speech.cs.cmu.edu/cgi-bin/cmudict
trans-unit.target: The Python code in this module is distributed with a BSD license. A full copy of the CMU Pronouncing Dictionary is included in this distribution. Learn more about the CMU Pronouncing Dictionary here: http://www.speech.cs.cmu.edu/cgi-bin/cmudict

trans-unit.source: This package was originally developed as part of my Spring 2015 research fellowship at ITP. Thank you to the program and its students for their interest and support!
trans-unit.target: This package was originally developed as part of my Spring 2015 research fellowship at ITP. Thank you to the program and its students for their interest and support!

trans-unit.source: Various tweaks and performance improvements.
trans-unit.target: Varios ajustes y mejoras de rendimiento.

trans-unit.target: También puedes descargar el código fuente e instalarlo manualmente:
